meanings.definition: The study of the human body.
meanings.sent1: In somatology, we learn about the different parts of the human body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often use somatology to understand how our bodies work.
meanings.sent3: During the somatology class, the students giggled when they had to study the anatomy of the human body.
meanings.sent4: Exploring somatology is like unraveling the mysteries of our own physical existence.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on somatology had detailed illustrations of the human body's structure.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of the structure and function of the body.
meanings.sent1: Researchers use somatology to investigate how our bodies function.
meanings.sent2: Studying somatology helps us understand the intricate workings of our bodies.
meanings.sent3: The somatology lab was filled with equipment used to analyze the body's structure and function.
meanings.sent4: In the world of somatology, every organ plays a crucial role in maintaining our health.
meanings.sent5: The professor's passion for somatology made the subject come alive for the students.
